summary: Chests in Dragon'sReach possess slightly better weapons for early game. I was surprised to find out that there are starter chests with one thousand gold and scores of free ingots, which isn't "balanced" at all. The chests in the Jarl's Quarters of Dragon'sreach have skyforge weapons, after all, Balgruuf is the Jarl of White
descriptionHtml:
This will eventually add a guarded armory in Dragonsreach. More guards will patrol the treasures that are available for the Dragonborn to steal. 
Chests in Dragon'sReach possess slightly better weapons for early game. I was surprised to find out that there are starter chests with one thousand gold and scores of free ingots, which isn't "balanced" at all. The chests in the Jarl's Quarters of Dragon'sreach have skyforge weapons, after all,Jarl Balgruuf should afford to have Skyforge steel weapons, being the Jarl and all.
author: SironaJona and JoezzaHawke
